channel.title: Ffs, creating shops?
channel.description:
Could someone help me please(yet again...) :| I want to make a staff shop, so I've put in the tele ::staffzone, spawned a npc (sigmund the merchant) created a shop (Shop id = 71) and the items. Then I went to Client.Java and added this: [code] } else if (NPCID == 1285) { // Staff Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71; // Staff Shop [/code]
now, how am I going to make this shop work? Like, what do I have to do so people can actually trade him?
Regards[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2009, 01:55:17 pm[/size][hr]anyone??

item.title: Ffs, creating shops?
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

Could someone help me please(yet again…)
I want to make a staff shop, so I’ve put in the tele ::staffzone, spawned a npc (sigmund the merchant) created a shop (Shop id = 71) and the items. Then I went to Client.Java and added this:

            } else if (NPCID == 1285) { // Staff Shop
                PutNPCCoords = true;
                WanneShop = 71; // Staff Shop

now, how am I going to make this shop work? Like, what do I have to do so people can actually trade him?

Regards[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 24, 2009, 01:55:17 pm[/size][hr]anyone??
